hero.quotePart1: “Live as if you were to die tomorrow.”
hero.quotePart2: “Learn as if you were to live forever.”
hero.entryText: We all use websites and apps in everyday life and often wonder why many things have to be complicated. As a software developer with a focus on Frontend development, I see it as my duty to provide high quality and cutting edge UX and clean code. The success of the product ultimately lies in the hands of the users.
hero.discover: Discover more about me and my work
